meanings.definition: To remove weight or pressure from something.
meanings.sent1: She was unweighting the backpack to make it easier to carry.
meanings.sent2: The physical therapist recommended unweighting the injured leg to aid in recovery.
meanings.sent3: The magician performed a trick by unweighting the heavy box, making it float in the air.
meanings.sent4: The yoga instructor guided the class in unweighting their bodies, allowing for a deeper stretch.
meanings.sent5: The astronaut felt the sensation of unweighting as the spacecraft entered zero gravity.

meanings.definition: The act of reducing the amount of weight or pressure on something.
meanings.sent1: The unweighting of the load made it easier to lift.
meanings.sent2: The unweighting of the barbell revealed the strength of the weightlifter.
meanings.sent3: The unweighting of the cake resulted in a collapsed dessert masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The unweighting of responsibilities at work allowed for a more relaxed weekend.
meanings.sent5: The unweighting of the package caused it to float effortlessly in the pool.
